title: Carrot Cake Cookies with Cream Cheese Filling

Ingredients.4: 1 cup unsalted butter, at room temperature

Ingredients.19: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, at room temperature

Ingredients.20: 0.5 cup unsalted butter, at room temperature

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper.

Directions.2: Combine white sugar, brown sugar, and butter for cookies in a mixing bowl. Beat until light and fluffy, 3 to 4 minutes. Add eggs and vanilla extract and mix on medium speed until well combined.

Directions.3: Sift flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, ginger, and salt together in a bowl. Mix into butter mixture on low speed until well combined. Mix in oats and carrots, followed by raisins and walnuts.

Directions.4: Chill for 1 hour in the refrigerator.

Directions.5: Scoop batter onto the prepared baking sheets using a tablespoon-sized scoop, leaving about 2 inches between cookies.

Directions.6: Bake in the preheated oven until edges are set, 12 to 15 minutes. Remove from the oven and let cool on a wire rack.

Directions.7: Beat cream cheese in a mixing bowl to soften. Add butter and mix until combined. Beat in confectioners' sugar, followed by vanilla extract. Beat 30 seconds more to lighten.

Directions.8: Spread frosting onto one cooled cookie. Sandwich together with another. Repeat with remaining cookies.
